name: The Life of a Stickleback
overview: The aim of the game is to guide the stickleback through territories where various aquatic creatures live, which will often prove to be very insidious if not even lethal enemies; our stickleback will try to avoid dangerous clashes, to cautiously win the competition of other males of its own species, and finally to find material to be able to build a refuge in which it will attract its mate and thus found a new family. Instinct and experience will guide, as occurs in nature, the stickleback in juggling dangers, prey and predators in the eternal game of selecting natural phenomena simulated in this game, it is essential to refer to the enclosed manual. Game was originally released in Italy in 1987 in Logica 2000 N°59 and a later English translation was released in 2017.
